text:
jaj~jiq bIjaqM ~MvarShTA# paqrjanyaqH paktA# saqsya(gm) su#pippaqlA OSha#dhayaH svadhicaraqNEya(gm) sU#pasadaqnO$&gniH sva#ddhyaqkShamaqntari#kSha(gm)supAqvaH pava#mAnaH sUpasthAqnA dyauH Siqvamaqsau tapa#n yathApUqrvama#hOrAqtrE pa#~jcadaqSinO$ &d^^rdhamAqsA-striq(gm)qSinOq mAsA$H klRuqptA Ruqtava#H SAqntaH 
sa#M~MvathsaqraH || 47
(jaj~jiq bIjaq - mEka#tri(gm)Sat) (A20)
